Title: A New Assessment Is Available!
Description: There's a new assessment available for you to complete! The feedback from completing this short activity will help you to keep track of your progress.

Title: Feedback From Your Last Assessment
Description: "Your control over your rate of speech has really improved since last month's assessment! It was much easier to understand what you were saying. Keep it up! :D"

Title: Featured Article: 'Stuttering is in the genes not the head, say scientists'
Description: Stuttering is not to do with nervousness or a traumatic childhood as portrayed in the award winning film The Kingâ€™s Speech but has its root cause in a genetic disorder, new research suggests.

Title: A Friend Is Looking For Feedback!
Description: Help Tom out by leaving him feedback on this recent recording!
